text: Puşi Dinulescu (; born Dumitru Dinulescu (27 August 1942 – 1 August 2019) was a Romanian playwright, movie, theatre and television director, novelist, poet and polemicist. He received The Bucharest Writers' Association Award (1979) for Linda Belinda (a collection of short stories) and The Writers' Union of Romania Award (1985), for his novel Îngerul contabil. Dinulescu died on 1 August 2019 in Bucharest of a heart attack at the age of 76.Dramaturgul şi regizorul Puşi Dinulescu a murit la vârsta de 76 de ani ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Writers from Bucharest Category:Romanian poets Category:Playwrights Category:Romanian movie directors
title: Puși Dinulescu
